nodes.text: The Small Village was a city on the planet Krant populated by Krantians and R2-D5 labor droids and included Prefab Shelters. In 0 ABY, the Krantian Resistance in the village was attacked by a squad of stormtroopers from Camp Sagol. The self-exiled Jedi Echuu Shen-Jon joined with the Rebel Leia Organa and killed the attackers. The Krantian leader then contacted them and turned over control of the city's Command center and the labor droids to them in order to recruit an army. The army was then used to save the nearby cities of Peche and Theenes from Imperial attacks emanating from Camp Sagol and Camp Kaxol.

The 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds identifies this base only as Small Village during the Leia Organa campaign. The campaign, and thus the village, is also included in the game's 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns. The size of the army and the disposition of the buildings in Small Village is a player choice.
